entries.description: In some cases, this test should be only exclusively with like tests (examples are cyto or pathology)
entries.comment: When  D is specified for this field, using field OM1-49 determines how tests must be grouped together.  Tests within the same Diagnostic Service Sector may be on the same requisition, and therefore in the same message

entries.description: This test can be included with any number of other tests
